sentences.english: Nobody has conducted research looking at the health effects of Bluetooth earpieces.
sentences.chinese: 没有人研究过蓝牙耳机会不会对健康造成影响。

sentences.english: OK, so the question is about Bluetooth. I think I heard.
sentences.chinese: 好，问题时关于蓝牙吧，我好像听清了。

sentences.english: In this scenario, a bluetooth keyboard could be connected as well.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，还可以连上一块蓝牙键盘。

sentences.english: How to connect A2DP from mobile to sink device programmatically?
sentences.chinese: 如何连接蓝牙移动下沉装置以编程方式？

sentences.english: Bluetooth should now correctly turn on and pair "out of the box" without tweaking.
sentences.chinese: 蓝牙功能现在应该可以灰常顺利地打开和配对。

sentences.english: Or you can use a Bluetooth wireless keyboard.
sentences.chinese: 或者你也可以使用蓝牙无线键盘。

sentences.english: When the call ended MP3 needs to replay by key-press.
sentences.chinese: 当蓝牙通话结束后，MP3需重新按键播放。

sentences.english: Finally, the application perspectives of Bluetooth wireless technology are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 给出了蓝牙技术在信息家电等系统的应用示例。

sentences.english: It has 2.0 Mega-pixel camera, and support Bluetooth.
sentences.chinese: 它有200万象素的摄像头，还支持蓝牙功能。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the strategy of scheduling in Bluetooth networking.
sentences.chinese: 文章主要研究蓝牙组网中的调度策略问题。

sentences.english: Bluetooth is an example of attempting this, so is USB.
sentences.chinese: 蓝牙就是这样的一个例子，还有USB也是。

sentences.english: This brand's cell phones usually have their IR, or Bluetooth interface in its the lower end.
sentences.chinese: 这个牌子的手机下端一般有红外或蓝牙接口。

sentences.english: Previous Bluetooth implementations featured keepalive message frequencies of up to several times per second.
sentences.chinese: 之前的两台设备上蓝牙一秒钟就要交换几次信息。

sentences.english: Improved Bluetooth phone book transfer of contacts to in-vehicle Bluetooth solutions.
sentences.chinese: 改善联系人蓝牙电话簿转移至车载蓝牙解决方案。

sentences.english: Improved Bluetooth phone book transfer of contacts to in-vehicle Bluetooth solutions.
sentences.chinese: 改善联系人蓝牙电话簿转移至车载蓝牙解决方案。
接入点映射与蓝牙技术。

definition: loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
